info.name: Joystiq - Clean Black
info.description:
Layout from style 31601 by user 52779.  Gets rid of the entire right side panel and a few other annoying elements.  Black background with a dark theme.  There are probably a few obscure/rare images here and there that still have white corners.  If you find any, let me know and I'll fix them.

Full size "After" screenshot:
http://sadpanda.us/images/205336-7J19EYH.png
info.additionalInfo:
2012 Nov 04: Fixed some images, layout, and colors.
2012 Jan 29: Added some post badges.
2011 Oct 19: Top menu nav images updated.
2011 Sep 21: Fixes here and there.  Main logo updated.
2011 Mar 10: Someone on Joystiq's end put a space after a class name.  Fixed.
2010 Sep 15: Fixed some Posts' badge images.
2010 Sep 04: Fixed a ton of stuff.  Looks presentable now.
